nf:module.nf:name: input_bitrate_computator
nf:module.nf:description: Registers for Bitrate Computation for input queues

nf:register.nf:name: cycle
nf:register.nf:description: Input register contains cycle parameter for time of sampling (6 possible values [0-5]. 0 is default)

nf:register.nf:name: q0_bitrate
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains input bit rate for queue 0

nf:register.nf:name: q1_bitrate
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains input bit rate for queue 1

nf:register.nf:name: q2_bitrate
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains input bit rate for queue 2

nf:register.nf:name: q3_bitrate
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains input bit rate for queue 3

nf:register.nf:name: total_bitrate
nf:register.nf:description: Output register contains total input bitrate
